thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 2 of 13
thread.title: Sadie Allen

author: Sadie Allen
title: Sadie Allen
text:
I'm so pleased with not only my purchases, but also the prompt customer service! This company truly cares about making us as customers happy!
I've made 2 purchases & the second one came with "not the normal" hard case.... I expressed my unhappiness & they were on it! I've been in contact 4 times via email & it was nothng but great customer satisfaction, top of the line customer service! It wasn't a big deal, but they wanted to make things just right! And if you've ever hesitated to order, wait no more! The quality is great! (I'm a little addicted now, 1 month 3 pairs) #firmooforthewin
